scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: npm run resolve -- node_modules/.bin/vite build --ssrManifest --outDir dist/client
scripts.build:server: npm run resolve -- node_modules/.bin/vite --ssr src/entry-server.tsx --outDir dist/server
scripts.generate: npm run resolve -- node_modules/.bin/vite --outDir dist/static && npm run build:server && node ./prerender.js
